lead_paragraph: THE INCREDULITY of neighbor Bull as to the achievements of America in the way of conquering the distance, " devouring the way" between any given points, rapidly yields to the reality. Their jockeys once had no faith in the four mile heats and 2: 40 time of Yankee racers; their infidelity is cured.
